DOC.brief_title: Oral Androgens Man-4 : ( Short Title : Oral T-4 )
DOC.detailed_description: This study carry double-blinded fashion , neither subject investigator aware treatment assignment study . This protocol design address hypothesis oral testosterone enanthate plus dutasteride suppress secretion LH FSH four week administration . In addition , compare gonadotropin suppression mediate dose testosterone enanthate ( 400 mg twice daily ) would expect maintain serum testosterone normal range throughout day , dose ( 800 mg daily ) administer daily . This large once-daily dose expect result higher peak lower trough end dose interval . Secondary endpoint study include ability oral testosterone enanthate plus dutasteride maintain short-term androgen-mediated endpoint mood sexual function 4-week treatment period well weekly measure safety , include blood count , PSA liver kidney function .
DOC.criteria: Males 18 55 year age In good general health base normal screen evaluation ( consist medical history , physical exam , normal serum chemistry , hematology , baseline hormone level ) Subject must agree participate another research drug study duration study Subject must agree donate blood study Subject must willing comply study protocol procedure Men poor general health , abnormal blood result ( clinical laboratory test hormone value ) A known history alcohol drug abuse A history testicular disease severe testicular trauma , A history bleed disorder current use anticoagulants A history sleep apnea and/or major psychiatric disorder A bodymass index great 35 , A history current use testosterone Infertility
